name: Mower Mayhem (Mystical_Pidgeon)
description:
Made for the GMTK Game Jam 2020 with the theme "Out of Control"

Try to mow as much as you can before you run out of gas! Be careful, this lawnmower has no brakes and is prone to stalling out. Oh, and the gas cap is missing.. so don't hit anything!

  • Turn with A/D or arrow keys
  • Start the engine by holding Space
  • Stop the engine by tapping Space
